extendedInfo.description: I love reading blogs and so this app is for me! Featured are some of the best on the topic of "do-it-yourself" culture such as Super Naturale's Glimmer, Make Magazine, DIY Life, Crafting a Green World, Geek Crafts and Hacked Gadgets. Get the latest do-it-yourself news and creative ideas from exploring these blogs, hand picked by our editors.Features========Â¤ Read full articles including links and imagesÂ¤ Scrolls vertically and horizontallyÂ¤ Lightweight app at only 158k!Â¤ Easily share articles with friends using Facebook, Twitter etcÂ¤ Choose between 6 different themesÂ¤ Available only for devices with a minimum of Android OS 2.0 and higher.How to use==========Â¤ Click on a headline to read the full articleÂ¤ Double-tap on an article to share itTags====diy, maker culture, make faire, craft, hand-made, handmade, geek, mod, modify, diy mod, green, eco, do-it-yourself, howto, how-toCheck out our puzzles. They work on your phone and you don't have to use your storage as they are web-based. Your comments are welcome!http://puzzles.dreamtreemobile.com

reviews.title: Keeps force closing
reviews.comment: I love the idea of it and the UI  is great but it keeps force closing on my DROID X.  Hopefully this will be fixed soon.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Seriously?! Uninstalled!!
reviews.comment: I downloaded this app about 2 days ago and just had a chance to open it about 5 minutes ago. It forced closed within a minute the 1st time I opened it. After reopening the app it force closed again 5 more times. Fix the excessive force closing & I may reconsider installing again.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unable to enjoy
reviews.comment: Looks like it would be a fabulous resource but it force closes before I can read far enough. :-( disappointment.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: good but fc\'s too much. please fix and i\'ll make it 5*
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love the idea of this but force closes immediately after trying to view something
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: force close
reviews.comment: its amazing idea but still force close. just please fix this :) and it will be perfect app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Please fix the force close issue. Great articles and info but frustrating app when it constantly and always closes. Scrolling can be difficult too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs a lot of work
reviews.comment: Good idea but need a lot off work keeps closing...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashing
reviews.comment: Hate constant crashing
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Constant Force close
reviews.comment: Had high hopes bc this was perfect for me, but its infuriating bc it never works.  Sad that it hasn\'t worked in months.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Issues scrolling through to view projects. Forced closed three time in less than a minute....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Seems like I would love this app if it would stop closing on me! Cant even read an article. :-( Samsung Moment
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: keeps force closeing on transformer
reviews.comment: will ammnd to 5* when this is fixed as this is excelwnt
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love it! Works great on HTC desire s! So inspirational! I check it everyday!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would be great if it didnt freeze my phone :-( xperia x10
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Force closes alot but is way to good to uninstall. Scrolling is difficult and freezes up. Would like to be able to remove blogs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So disappointed...
reviews.comment: Was looking forward to using this app but won\'t stay open long enough to read a full article. Fixes desperately needed!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cheetah
reviews.comment: Please Fix force close. Cool app. I\'d love to use it!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Droid X -- Flop!
reviews.comment: OS ver. greater than 2.0 on Droid X and am booted out within 30 seconds.  Great concept, but lacks compatibility.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app is crap!!!!!
reviews.author: nathan mays
